resources.string:
ContextProvider - a unified, query-able interface to all contextual data on the device. 

© 2011 by Michael Mitchell and Chris Meyers 

http://github.com/mitchtech/android-context

Release Notes 
0.10 
 - merged all changed into ContextExpandableList; moved obsolete files to defunct folder 

0.09 
 - Added more finance outputs; Added more finance displays. 

0.8 
 - Merge branch 'adwhirl'; Fixed problems with previous (adwhirl) merge. 

0.7 
 - Changed lux (light sensor value) to float instead of int. Still need to tweak it to detect pocket 

0.6 
 - Added cliboard. Added shelter and pocket to context. Fixed weather
